q: What payment methods do you accept?
a: We accept the standard checkout methods shown in your cart, typically cards, fast transfers, and local wallets where available.

q: What are your best sellers?
a: Our best sellers change over time — check the featured/bestsellers section on the store homepage for the latest picks.

q: How long does shipping to Poland take?
a: Standard delivery usually takes 1–2 business days.

q: Do you offer express delivery to Poland?
a: Yes, express shipping typically takes 24 hours.

q: How are weekend orders shipped to Poland?
a: Weekend orders are weekend orders are packed on Monday morning.

q: Do you ship pre-orders to Poland?
a: Yes, they leave according to the release date shown on the product page.

a: Standard delivery usually takes 3–5 business days.

q: Do you offer express delivery to the EU?
a: Yes, express shipping typically takes 48 hours.

q: How are weekend orders shipped to the EU?
a: Weekend orders are shipments go out on the nearest Monday.

q: Do you ship pre-orders to the EU?
a: Yes, they leave according to the release date shown on the product page.

q: How much is shipping to Poland?
a: Courier costs 14.99 PLN, lockers 11.99 PLN. Free above 199 PLN.

q: Is there free shipping to Poland?
a: Yes, orders above 199 PLN qualify for free shipping.

q: Can I pay extra for insured shipping to Poland?
a: Yes, choose the insured shipping option during checkout.

q: Do you combine multiple orders going to Poland?
a: If both packages haven't left the warehouse yet, we can merge them into one shipment.

q: How many days do I have to return in case of size exchange?
a: You have 30 calendar days from delivery.

q: How does the warranty work for electronics?
a: It lasts 24 months. File a claim via your account.

q: Do you offer repairs or replacements?
a: We diagnose the item first. If a fix isn't possible, we send a replacement.

q: Will I get a replacement unit while mine is repaired?
a: For items above 1000 PLN we provide a temporary replacement.

q: How can I track my claim?
a: Log in and open the Claims tab to see live updates.

q: How do I reach the Silver tier?
a: Spend 500 zł within 12 months.

q: What are the perks of the Silver tier?
a: You get 5% discount.

q: Do loyalty points expire?
a: They expire after 12 months of inactivity.

q: Can I move points to another account?
a: No, points stay with the account that earned them.
